display_long_description:
Board at work, Bored at home then jump into The Training Facility. Enter the world of guns bows and arrows and timed runs with a bit of sass to go with it.

There are 3 facilities to choose from

Pistol Facility

Pistol Facility V2

Bow & Arrow

Then we have 3 types of easy on the Eyes old school VR Missions to practice your VR skills on. From improving your Movement to climbing and practice your aim in hostage situations or our cheeky holograms to take down.

Can you master the sprint movement, the jump movement even the hop movement to get the best and fastest times Possible.

WORD OF WARNING . 

This is a full locomotion game only. No teleports, No comfort options. No hand holding. So if you only play with comfort options. This could be a way to help get you used to full motion games in small bursts

Some people are prone to motion sickness whilst playing VR for the first few time but they also want to expand in more detailed games with full locomotion. So Welcome to The Training Facility. Some quick designed levels to help in this process with guns or bow & Arrows at your dispense , climbing & sprinting to get you ready for the more intense games out there. 

But don't think this is just some sort of practice or exercise game to help you NOOOOO, It also offers a challenge to those who want to push themselves and get the fastest possible times in the course. A speed running game also in VR One wrong move, One missed climb and it could add seconds onto your final run time
